content:
cds-hooks-bot opened Issue #347

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 141

Submitted by Walter Suarez from Kaiser Permanente

Chapter:
Section: HTTP Request
Type: A-S :bulb:
In Person Requested? No

Comment:
An EHR might need to perform calls on 1 or several CDS Services. How would it work when there are 2 or more CDS Services that the EHR is interacting with? Would there be one posting of the JSON document to each service point? It would be good to clarify the case of 2 or more CDS Services

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot edited Issue #347

## May 2018 Ballot Comment 141

Submitted by Walter Suarez from Kaiser Permanente

Chapter:
Section: HTTP Request
Type: A-S :bulb:
In Person Requested? No

Comment:
An EHR might need to perform calls on 1 or several CDS Services. How would it work when there are 2 or more CDS Services that the EHR is interacting with? Would there be one posting of the JSON document to each service point? It would be good to clarify the case of 2 or more CDS Services

_This issue was imported by @cds-hooks-bot from the consolidated CDS Hooks May 2018 ballot spreadsheet._

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #347

Proposed Disposition: Considered - question answered
Proposed Disposition Comment:
Good question. The EHR invokes each CDS Service individually and then collates the cards from each service and renders them as appropriate for their context.

cds-hooks-bot commented on Issue #347

## :telephone_receiver: CDS Working Group Block Vote (5-30-2018)

Meeting notes: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=File:2018-05-30_CDS_WG_Call_Minutes.docx

Julia Skapik moved the following disposition, seconded by @brynrhodes.

Disposition: Considered - question answered
Disposition Comment:
Good question. The EHR invokes each CDS Service individually and then collates the cards from each service and renders them as appropriate for their context.

:+1: For: 12
:expressionless: Abstain: 0
:-1: Against: 0

:tada: The motion passed! :tada:

brettmarquard commented on Issue #347

Closed per CDS Hooks block vote Wednesday, 5/30/2018
